Text.Page:
We need to hurt argon behemoths, particularly those involved with collecting iteris shards.

Kill suulvir harvesters and arzakaar guardians throughout {@Rgn:50001}.

Report to {@LinkCreature:250#1009} at {@Rgn:50003} when you're finished.
Victory's assured with soldiers like you on our side.
You didn't accomplish the mission objectives. Keep trying.
